src_text: In 1895, after defeat in the First Sino-Japanese War (1894-1895), the Qing government signs the Treaty of Shimonoseki, by which it cedes sovereignty over Taiwan to Japan, which rules the island until 1945.
ref_text: Ena 1895, ni oti na nona caroba ena iMatai ni valu ni Sino-Japanese (1894-1895), na matanitu o Qing a vakadonuya na Treaty ni Shimonoseki, koya soli Taiwan ki vei Japani, ka veiliutaki ena yanuyanu me yacova na 1945.
hyp_text: E 1895, ena ni vakaivakatini ena Cina-Japana ni Turaga (1894-1895), na Qing kerekere ni vosa ni Shimonoseki, ena na kena ni cedese ni tamata ni Taiwan ki Japana, ki na kena ni rai na vanua ena 1945.

Ia na kena mai cava ga na iValu qo, mai vakilai tale na duidui ni rai kei na tuvatuva ni cicivaki ni nodrau vanua ka vuni duidui kei na tasere ni nodrau veiwekani.

hyp_text: E na vanua kece kece era kece ni vosa, era kece na kena vosa na Franse, kei na kena vosa na veidre ni beach resort na luxury.

[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Fijian]: {"translation": "Ena vica vata na senitiuri, era vakaivatavatataka na qele ena veibaba cere ni vanua qori me yaco sara ena ulunivanua e sarava tu yani na waitui."}

[Fijian]: {"translation": "E 800 na maile ni Salanipaipo ni Trans-Alaska a sogo ni a tasova e udolu na taqe ni waiwai mai na ceva e Fairbanks, mai Alaska."}

[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Fijian]: {"translation": "Na gauna oqo o Belgium a tiki ni vanua Luxembourg ena gauna e liu ia a qai vakayacani me o Belgian ni oti na Beivaluvaluti nei Belgian ena 1830."}

src_text: The modern city of Casablanca was founded by Berber fishermen in the 10th century BCE, and was used by the Phoenicians, Romans, and the Merenids as a strategic port called Anfa.
ref_text: Na siti o Casablanca ena gauna qo era se tauyavu sara mai kina na dauqoli e Berber ena ika10 ni senitiuri BSK, e qai vakayagataki tale ga vei ira Dauveisele, kai Roma ke ira na Merenids me ikelekele ni waqa na Anfa.
hyp_text: Na kena gauna oqo o Casablanca na kena vosa vakaivi na Berber ni kena ivakavuvale ni ka 10 na senitiuri BCE, kei na vosa ni Phoenicia, Roma, kei na Merenidi kei na waiwai na Anfa.

src_text: For Australians, the idea of 'flat white' coffee is foreign. A short black is 'espresso', cappuccino comes heaped high with cream (not froth), and tea is served without milk.
ref_text: Vei ira e Ositerelia, e vakasama vulagi na ‘vulavula dodonu’ ena kofi. Na ‘espresso’ e loaloa leka, na cappuccino e levu na kena kirimu (sega ni vuso), na ti e sega ni vakasucu.
hyp_text: Kei Ausralia, na vosa 'flat white' ni kofe e rawa ni sota. E short black e 'espresso', cappuccino e vakaivakavaki ena kerekere (me rawa ni kerekere), kei na tei e vakaivakavaki ena kerekere.

src_text: The term safari in popular use refers to overland travel to view the stunning African wildlife, particularly on savanna.
ref_text: Na yaca na safari e dau vakayagataki vakalevu e vakaibalebale ena gade ena dua na vanua era tu kina na manumanu kila rairai vinaka, vakabibi ena vanua mamaca sigasiga.
hyp_text: Na vosa safari na rawa ni veivakavulewa e na kena yavuwa e ira na liga ni vanua, na kena yavuwa e ira na savanna, na kena yavuwa e ira na Africa.

[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Fijian]: {"translation": "Ena vica vata na senitiuri, era vakaivatavatataka na qele ena veibaba cere ni vanua qori me yaco sara ena ulunivanua e sarava tu yani na waitui."}

[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Fijian]: {"translation": "E 800 na maile ni Salanipaipo ni Trans-Alaska a sogo ni a tasova e udolu na taqe ni waiwai mai na ceva e Fairbanks, mai Alaska."}

[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Fijian]: {"translation": "Na gauna oqo o Belgium a tiki ni vanua Luxembourg ena gauna e liu ia a qai vakayacani me o Belgian ni oti na Beivaluvaluti nei Belgian ena 1830."}

[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
